item.title: Strykewyrms
item.dc:creator: @xxifish_i_x xxifish i x
item.description:
@xxifish_i_x wrote:

Figure out the rest.

[code]package server.model.npcs;

import server.model.players.Client;

public class Strykewyrm {

public void strykewyrm(Client c) {

			public static final NPC n = NPCHandler.npcs[c.npcClickIndex];
			if (n == null)
				return;
			 final int[][] strykewyrm = { {9462, 9463}, {9464, 9465}, {9466, 9467} };
			EventManager.getSingleton().addEvent(new Event() {
				public int time = 2;
				public void execute(EventContainer stomp) {
					if (time == 2)
						c.startAnimation(4278);
						
					if (time == 0) {
						for (int j = 0; j < strykewyrm.length; j++) {
							if (n.npcType == strykewyrm[j][0])
								n.requestTransform(strykewyrm[j][1]);
						}
						n.killerId = c.playerId;
						n.facePlayer(c.playerId);
						stomp.stop();
					}
					
					if (time > 0)
						time--;
				}
			}, 600);
}

}[/code]

credits to Relax Lawl over at Rune-Server <3

//he should get his damn domain payed -.-

Read full topic
